briefTitle: Efficacy and Tolerability of Subcutaneously Administered Treprostinil Sodium in Patients With Severe (Non-operable) Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension (CTREPH)
officialTitle: A Double Blind Controlled Clinical Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Tolerability of Subcutaneous Treprostinil Sodium in Patients With Severe Non-operable Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension (CTREPH)

arms.label: Treprostinil sodium low dose - Arm I
Treprostinil sodium high dose - Arm II

summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the effect on six-minute walking test (6MWT) distance after 24 weeks treatment with subcutaneous (SC) Treprostinil Sodium in patients with Severe (inoperable) Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in 6-minute Walk Test Distance After 24 Weeks
